mapper.insert: insert into membertbl(userid, password, name, gender, email) values(#{userid}, #{password}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{email})
mapper.delete: delete from membertbl where userid=#{userid} and password=#{password}
mapper.update: update membertbl set email=#{email} where userid=#{userid} and password=#{password}
mapper.select: select * from membertbl where userid=#{userid} and password=#{password}
